article: Bob and Frank are good friends. They often go to movies together on weekends. Bob's favorite actor is Cheng Long. He has an action movie, Who Am I . It's very exciting. Frank likes the actor Rick Smith. He really likes his movie. Black September . Frank thinks it's a very successful thriller. Bob and Frank are American , but they both like Beijing Opera, they think they can learn about Chinese history from these movies.
questions: Bob and Frank often _ together on weekends.
options: go to see an action movie
Bob and Frank are good friends.
Who Am I is an action movie.
We can learn about Chinese history from action movies.
Bob and Frank like Beijing Opera.
